title: For carpet area less than 30
clause_text: For carpet area less than 30.00 Sq.m. premium shall be 10% of the differential amount calculated as per clause (iv) below;
section: Process of Allotment to Beneficiaries and Conditions thereof :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
